comments:
Description:
NPE when change parameter type from boolean to string
Build number:2.2.0.v20070604

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report parameter, set data type as boolean, select true as default value.
2. Change data type to String

Expected result:
No Exception.

Actual result:
NPE.
